name: Utopic
overview:
Save links for your own use. Share them with others. Discover cool content.

One-click bookmarking Browser extensions to quickly save any web page. Links are auto-tagged by keywords to find them fast later.

Discover hot topics See what friends and influencers share and like. Follow people sharing your interests.

Aggregate favorites Automatically collect and visually publish all the links you’ve shared or favorited on Twitter, Facebook, Youtube, Google Reader and elsewhere.

We predict user’s interests through an automated semantic analysis of public information. We create a detailed & ranked interest/topic profile of a user, based on his “digital footprint”: web pages, social networks, tweets etc.

Semantic & content analysis is used to tag ~0.5 million unique content items daily with keywords & rate their popularity, then matched to users interests.

Skype & Kazaa Founding Engineer & Chief Architect Ahti Heinla invested & is behind the instant predictive personalization, content analysis & targeting technology.

2 other involved angels built Russia’s largest social network Odnoklassniki.ru, sold to DST / Yuri Milner.

Robert Scoble interview: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s9kZcY-ZJsU “I’m loving this new news aggregator, especially on my big screen, but check out the HTML5 version for tablets too!” “I’m really loving @theutopic - a new way to view news from your social graph”

Mashable: http://shrt.st/11my - 13 Alternative Ways to Consume Your News.

Techcrunch: “A nice visual take on the most popular links, videos, music, movies and events shared and liked by your friends.”

Arctictartup: “Utopic can be a time saver.”

Killerstartups: “If you find yourself thinking that [Utopic] has true potential, then you are not the only one.”

Dailybloggr: “Found some interesting content which wasnâ€™t found on my Facebook dashboard.”
